means: 没有听到的，不予倾听的

sentence.Network_en: Martin's weak cries for help went unheard until 6.40pm yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 直到昨天傍晚6点40分，马丁微弱的呼救声才被人听到。

sentence.Network_en: She had not waited for any explanation but had condemned him unheard.
sentence.Network_cn: 她没等他解释，就指责他充耳不闻。
他充满激情的请求未被理睬。

unhurt 没有受伤的;未受损害的unheard 闻所未闻In heart
Character  - Chinese... ... ( 前所未闻 )[ unheard-of] ( 强人所难 )[ force someone to do something against his will].

list.abs: 职称英语（综合类）辅导讲议－词汇学习（2） ... unacceptable: 不可接受的。 unheard of: 没有听说过的。 unbelievable: 难以置信的 …

the transition was an unheard - of one ., 这种转移是出奇的.
At an unheard signal , the ground began to seethe ., 在一个无声的信号指挥下 , 地面开始沸腾起来.

entry.tran: 没听到的；不被理睬的；被忽略的
entry.def: If you say that a person or their words go unheard, you are expressing criticism because someone refuses to pay attention to what is said or take it into consideration.

example.tran: 他充满激情的请求未被理睬。

example.ex: She had not waited for any explanation but had condemned him unheard.
example.tran: 她没等他解释，就指责他充耳不闻。

entry.tran: 不为人知的；前所未闻的
entry.def: If you describe spoken comments or pieces of music as unheard, you mean that most people are not familiar with them because they have not been expressed or performed in public.

example.ex: A vast treasure-trove of virtually unheard melody awaits discovery by this new audience.
example.tran: 大量不为人知的优美旋律正等着这批新听众来发掘。

example.ex: ...a country where social criticism was largely unheard until this year.
example.tran: 直到今年为止对社会批判基本闻所未闻的国家

entry.def: If someone's words or cries go unheard, nobody can hear them, or a particular person cannot hear them.

example.ex: Martin's weak cries for help went unheard until 6.40pm yesterday.
example.tran: 直到昨天傍晚6点40分，马丁微弱的呼救声才被人听到。

means.word_mean: 1. not necessarily inaudible but not heard

auth_sentence.content: Behind each one are many more unheard voices.
auth_sentence.res_content: Behind each one are many more unheard voices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Behind each one are many more unheard voices.

auth_sentence.content: Difficulties growing stem cells are not unheard of.

auth_sentence.content: "Double jeopardy" of an unheard-of second full review.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Double jeopardy" of an unheard-of second full review.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Double jeopardy" of an unheard-of second full review.
